segments.text: Hello ! I need to make a copy of something at once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a copy machine on the first floor in our computer lab , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's ten cents a copy , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm only making one copy , so I guess I can afford it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A dime is still a bargain , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
